# 0.40.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    integrity = "sha256-ww398ehv1QZQp26mRbOkXy8AZnsGGHpoXpVU4WfKl+4=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.40.0/rules_rust-v0.40.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Fix linkopts set in cc deps of bindgen by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2422
* Use a path instead of a string for emit in rustc command-line arguments. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2445
* Fixes the ci failure in Bazel by @sgowroji in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2482
* Add script to revendor all crates by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2459
* Update wasm-bindgen to 0.2.91 by @alexkirsz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2489
* Use commit from cargo lock file for git repositories by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2490
* Use non-canonical repo name in hub repo by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2491
* Update crate_universe to allow re-pinning precise packages with pins by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2493
* Check if resolved index URL starts with sparse+ by @nickcollier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2498
* Bump crate_universe version to `0.11.0` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2478
* Introduce @rules_testing for Starlark tests by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2480
* Update crates_universe render script to run from Bazel by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2492
* Allow rules to provide their own rust-analyzer providers by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2487
* Update apple rules by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2506
* Add MODULE.bazel.lock to gitignore by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2505
* Replace deprecated `ctx.build_file_path` by @mai93 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2503
* fix rustdoc: omit link flags for rustdoc by @bgeron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2467
* Updated label crate to understand canonical vs apparent repositories by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2507
* Set allow_empty on unknown globs by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2509
* Re-vendor all crates by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2514
* Introduce rules_rust_unsupported_feature by @tpudlik in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2511
* Fix bzlmod examples on windows by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2454
* Implement support for dylib linkage by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2414
* Fix all-crate-deps with bzlmod and conditionals. by @criemen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2516
* Locate license file in packge root if not specified in cargo metadata by @nickcollier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2521
* Split CrateID CrateNameAndVersionReq by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2525
* Add public interface to lockfile interospection by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2515
* Use pub(crate) rather than pub by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2526
* Make `Select` accessors public by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2528
* Release 0.40.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2527

## New Contributors
* @sgowroji made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2482
* @mai93 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2503
* @bgeron made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2467
* @tpudlik made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2511
* @criemen made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2516

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.39.0...0.40.0

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Added `incompatible_no_rustc_sysroot_env` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2428
* Use canonical repo name for aspects by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2450
* Make cross-compiling with bzlmod possible, added example by @jondo2010 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2419
* [docs/cargo.md] Add missing comma by @NilsIrl in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2456
* Remove the no-op argument host_fragments=. by @lberki in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2466
* Add argument `include_coverage` to toggle if `InstrumentedFilesInfo` is created by @kiwiwarmnfuzzy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2457
* Added Rust 1.76.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2468
* Remove the remaining host_fragments= arguments. by @lberki in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2472
* Add Bazel version matrix to bzlmod builds by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2469
* Add support for `all_crate_deps` when using bzlmod by @AmeliasCode in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2461
* Use -C link-arg= instead of link-args to handle nested spaces by @kcking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2471
* Fix serialization of cargo_config attribute with bzlmod by @gferon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2477
* Generate package license metadata by @nickcollier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2476
* Fix type error in rust-analyzer rule by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2479
* Release 0.39.0 by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2473

## New Contributors
* @NilsIrl made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2456
* @kiwiwarmnfuzzy made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2457
* @AmeliasCode made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2461
* @nickcollier made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2476

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.38.0...0.39.0

## What's Changed
* Switch from `sha256` to `integrity` in release notes by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2389
* Support third party crates with bzlmod by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1910
* Replaced multiple usages of `String` with `Label`. by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2363
* Fix missing .wasm output for rust_wasm_bindgen by @alexkirsz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2396
* Stringify annotation labels by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2394
* Fix name of toolchain repo by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2395
* Advertise CcInfo provider on rules by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2126
* Add test for query and cquery in the repo by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2398
* Change default Rust distribution downloads from .tar.gz to .tar.xz by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2399
* Add annotation support for transient crates. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2392
* Allow `RustBindgen` action to get `--gcc-toolchain` from cc toolchains by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2400
* Minor cleanup of prost rules by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2397
* Fix the patch_tool annotation. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2404
* Fix #2402: use `get_lib_name_default(lib)` instead of `lib.owner.name`. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2405
* Fix #2406: use codegen option `link-args` to forward `user_link_flags` in bindgen. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2407
* Nix Example updated `rules_nixpkgs` version and removed CI workaround. by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2409
* Prep for 0.37.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2403
* Use # not / as a sed escape character by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2412
* Drop import macro by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2411
* Fix rustfmt toolchains when consuming rules_rust with bzlmod. by @jondo2010 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2410
* Provide a better error message when trying to generate rust-project.json by @jondo2010 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2196
* Update android example to use Starlark version of android_ndk_repository by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2417
* Allow ~ in repository names by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2427
* Prepare rust rules for Starlark CcToolchainInfo. by @buildbreaker2021 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2424
* Update rules_apple by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2436
* Prep 0.38.0 release by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2437

## New Contributors
* @buildbreaker2021 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2424

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.36.2...0.38.0

## What's Changed
* Include all toolchain files in the current toolchain by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2336
* fix: use `watch_file` in `.envrc` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2343
* Minor cleanup of `.bazelrc` and `presubmit.yaml` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2341
* _rust_binary_impl: propagate `data` to the crate info by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2342
* chore: remove print from MODULE.bazel by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2345
* Register apple cc toolchain by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2352
* Register a toolchain by default in MODULE.bazel by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2351

* Minor cleanup by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2357
* Added Rust 1.74.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2354
* Include more cc_toolchain flags in RustBindgen actions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2358
* chore: add `//bzlmod:hello_world_test` and use it as BCR presubmit by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2347
* Added `rust_unpretty_aspect` and `rust_unpretty` rules by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2356
* `crate.select()` support by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1977
* Fix `alias_rules` missing CcInfo and not being listed in `CARGO_BAZEL_SRCS` and misc Nix example fixes. by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2353
* Remove `CrateFeatures::Legacy` by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2338
* Release 0.35.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2360

## What's Changed
* rust-analyzer: Include prost_runtime as a dep for rust_prost_library by @DolceTriade in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2290
* Fix inclusion/exclusion of optional dependencies by @kersson in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2295
* Add android in runtime linking support check by @gferon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2144
* Improve the error message when crate root couldn't be found. by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2296
* Cleanup sysroot flag by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2297
* Declare dependencies in vendored crates by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2246
* Use js_info macro to populate JsInfo provider (js_rust_wasm_bindgen) by @jstuder-gh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2303
* Add an option to save the json output from rustc to pass to rust-analyzer by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1942
* Replace fixedReleaser  by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2304
* Updated direct dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2308
* Move implementation detail settings into private module by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2305
* Add a new presubmit environment for bzlmod by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2309
* fix: `rustc_compile_action` emits `CcInfo` for `wasm32` targets by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1979
* NixOS added as a Platform target including a pseudo target triple by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2311
* Pin repo to bazel 6.4.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2318

## Breaking Changes

- `rust_toolchain.target_json` changed from a label to a string. Users can either move their existing json files into Starlark dicts or convert the sources on the fly with a repository rule (an example can be found in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1810)


## What's Changed
* Unify functions for computing constraint values for platform triple abi by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1805
* Updated platform triple values from strings to structs ("triple") by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1804
* Convert `rust_toolchain` attrs `exec_triple` and `target_triple` to structs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1808
* Delete `rust_toolchain.rusrc_srcs` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1807
* Disable job in CI to avoid infrastructure failure. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1816
* Added tests for the `triple` constructor by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1811
* Use correct dynamic link args fro proc-macro crates by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1803
* support `resolver = "2"` target-specific features by @wmatthews-google in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1710
* Updated `rust_toolchain.target_json` to take encoded json strings by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1810
* Use env method recently added to cargo_metadata by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1813
* Fixes resolver issue with root packages and another dependency format by @Dig-Doug in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1819
* Encapsulate running cargo into a struct by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1815
* Instructions on how to perform `rustfmt` check (#1822) by @fmorency in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1823
* Added update known shas to include T1-T2 triples by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1824
* Various cleanups by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1828
* Updated rules_rust to version 0.18.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1829
